ygData.subject: Re: LOC - (enchantment of light spell??)
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, why do we want enchantment of light? just to make something glow? and, where is this Verant???  :) ... From: Rob Berryhill  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, why do we want enchantment of light? just to make something glow?
and, where is this Verant??? :)

----- Original Message -----
From: Rob Berryhill <racefan@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 12:20 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: LOC - (enchantment of light spell??)


> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> GZ (Geoffrey something) the spell guy at Verant.
>
> Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
> Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
> http://www.hoa-rpg.com/
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Ric R [mailto:redr@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 2:37 PM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: LOC - (enchantment of light spell??)
> >
> >
> > From: Ric R <redr@...>
> >
> >
> > What is the source of your information that they are not ingame yet?
> >
> >
> >
> > At 02:16 PM 4/22/99 -0500, you wrote:
> > >From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
> > >
> > >Enchantment of Light & Enchantment of Brilliance are not in the game
yet.
> > >
> > >Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
> > >Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
> > >http://www.hoa-rpg.com/
> > >
> > >> -----Original Message-----

> > >> Subject: [eqenchanters] LOC - (enchantment of light spell??)
> > >>
> > >>
> > >> From: "Magik" <aarongb@...>
> > >>
> > >> I hit level 4 last nite and I spent a good amoun tof cash on
> > buying ALL of
> > >> the spells in this circle....and Id just like to
> > >> say.....DAMN!!!!......there
> > >> sre SO many.....I didnt even get ALL of them and I almost filled
three
> > >> pages.......I missed on that I really wanted to have.....being a
> > >> BAT (HAHA!)
> > >> of all races.....I cant see in the dark so ID love to have
> > Enchantment of
> > >> Light to cast on my staff.....wouldnt that ROCK!!>....but I
> > wasnt able to
> > >> find it and I talked to a few enchanters that couldnt find it
> > either last
> > >> nite......Im in Erudin now but will be making my way to
> > Rivervale shortly
> > >> and then on to Freeport......has anyone been able to find this
> > >> spell and if
> > >> so WHERE??!!!......thnx in advance......
> > >>
> > >>
> > >> Neurosiz of E'ci
